data.actual_result: spellcheck works everywhere else in the app but channels and DMs
data.expected_result: spellcheck should work in channels and DMs when typing messages just like it works in other places or how it works on "some" other keyboards
data.short_description: {Samsung stock keyboard specific} spellcheck is not working in channels and DMs but works everywhere else in the app
data.steps_to_repro: - go to your Smart typing settings and turn Auto replace off (if you have it on) - turn Auto spellcheck on for the language you're going to test with - open Discord and insert a misspelled word in a channel or DM - notice how there is no red underline - type the same word in e.g search, QS, nickname change or server name etc.. - notice how there is a red underline indicating that the word is misspelled
